notes: Voters living overseas have until 10/22/2018 to register to vote.
Voters in Illinois can register to vote on any day, including Election Day
Kansas still has 2016 information on their website, so this is our best guess at the moment.
10/9/2018 is the deadline to register to vote by mail

Regular voter registration closes at 5 p.m. on 5/7/2018.
Individuals can late-register at the county election office beginning the next day and through close of polls on election day.
In-person deadline is 10/16/2018; online voter registration deadline is 10/18/2018
Voters do not register in North Dakota
Voters in Vermont can register to vote on any day, including Election Day
On Election Day qualified electors may register to vote and cast full ballots at the polling places for their precincts of residence
